modShortDescription: AuroraGiggleFairy (Previously known as RilesPlus) has updated the HUD for A20. This overhaul provides additional information while attempting to keep the minimalist appeal.
modDescription:
AuroraGiggleFairy (Previously known as RilesPlus) has updated the [HUD](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-hud-mod/) for A20\. This overhaul provides additional information while attempting to keep the minimalist appeal.

* Works server side
* Wider and more accurate compass
* Chatbox improvement
* Time and Date shown on menus
* Simple Container Status Colors
* FULL Language Support!
* (Optional) Enhanced Patch Available

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DvwHAeYdqLgZ3_1ao4TnvfYBwc-SzFVA/view?usp=sharing)** AGF HUDPlus  
**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HQdmJJsuzWXYwPPLRNGXgPDN12x3wHHp/view?usp=sharing)** Enhanced Patch  
**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1L9fSOBADyX_zGVz4VNH7mv2lT0yuSa9F/view?usp=sharing)** Khaine’s [15 Slot Toolbelt](https://7daystodiemods.com/15-slot-toolbelt/) Compatibility Patch

If you appreciate AuroraGiggleFairy’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=2AM5XX8GPXCTN).

If you need help, you can use this [support link](https://discord.gg/Vm5eyW6N4r).

**Credits:** AuroraGiggleFairy
